invite.name: invite
invite.description: Send an invite link to add the bot.

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Verify if the bot is online.

balance.name: balance
balance.description: Shows how many Fastcoins someone has.

ban.name: ban
ban.description: Bans a member from this server.

soft.name: soft
soft.description: Ban and unban the user just by deleting their messages.

bio.name: bio
bio.description: Manage the biography of your profile.

update.description: Sets a biography on your profile.

biography.name: biography
biography.description: The text that will be the new biography.

coins.name: coins
coins.description: Shows a list of the richest users.

reps.name: reps
reps.description: Shows a list of the users with the most reputation points.

profile.name: profile
profile.description: Shows yours or someone else's profile.

rep.name: rep
rep.description: Gives a reputation point to someone.

user.name: user
user.description: User to give the reputation point.
